text:
="preserve">Antônio de Jesus Dias (28 January 1942 – 3 September 2020) was a Brazilian politician. He was born in Anápolis, Goiás. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies three separate times. Jesus Dias was Deputy between 1980 to 1981, again from 1987 to 1991 and again from 1991 to 1993. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement.
Jesus Dias died on 3 September 2020 in Rio de Janeiro from COVID-19, aged 78.
